Title: Prohibits the knowing and reckless promotion of unlawful or false material and providing remedies for the violation of such prohibition
Summary: Prohibits the knowing and reckless promotion of unlawful or false material; provides remedies for the violation of such prohibition.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to prohibiting the knowing and reckless promotion of unlawful or false material and providing remedies for the violation of such prohibition
